00033             ServerDataObject.original_file_name

00054 ultimix_file_input_view_AfterImageUploadProcessor = function( File , ServerData , ReceivedResponse )
00055 {
00056       try
00057       {
00058             var Progress = new FileProgress( File , this.customSettings.progressTarget );
00059             Progress.setComplete();
00060             Progress.setStatus( ultimix.get_string( 'complete' ) );
00061             Progress.toggleCancel( false );
00062             
00063             var ServerDataObject = {};
00064             eval( "ServerDataObject=" + ServerData );
00065             
00066             ultimix.file_input.SetSingleUploadedFileInfo( ServerDataObject , this.customSettings );
00067       }
00068       catch( ex )
00069       {
00070             this.debug( ex );
00071       }
